article_title: Bottom Lines: N.J. bungle on tobacco settlement still costing taxpayers
article_text: We have used your information to see if you have a subscription with us. So far we have not found one. If you feel you are currently subscribed please click on the button to attempt to find your account.

og.description: A ProPublica analysis of what states did with billions of dollars from tobacco companies — ostensibly to offset the health-care costs of smoking — provides a helpful reminder of how things have gone so wrong in New Jersey.
og.title: Bottom Lines: N.J. bungle on tobacco settlement still costing taxpayers
